overview_of_class: This course examines the growth of four of the world's great cities: St. Petersburg, Bombay, Shanghai, and Dubai in the 18th, 19th, 20th, and 21st centuries. The growth of these mega-cities provide a lens for understanding broader historical developments including Absolutism, the Industrial Revolution, Capitalism, Communism, Urbanization, Imperialism, Anti-Imperialism, Nationalism, the Cold War, and Globalization.
